st: Shareefon Ka
s:
Shareefon Ka
Zamane Main Maine
Haal Jo Dekha Ke
Sharafat Shod Di Maine

Waffa Pe Mitne Walon Ka
Maine Anjaam Jo Dekha Ke
Waffa Hi
Shod Di Maine

st: garmiye hasrat ke nakam se jalte hai
s:
garmiye hasrat ke nakam se jalte hai
hum chiragon ki tarah shaam se jalte hai…
jab aata hai tera naam mere naam ke saath..
naa jano kyon log hamare naam se jalte hai

From Hum Aapke Hai Kaun:-
Kaate Nahin Kat Te Lamhe Intezaar Ke,
Nazaren Bichaein Baithe Hain Raste Pe Yaar Ke,
Dil Ne Kaha Dekhe Jo Jalwe Husne Yaar Ke,
Laya Hain Unhe Kaun Falak Se Utaar Ke…

st: Aaj utni bhi nahin Mehkhane mein ,
s:
Aaj utni bhi nahin Mehkhane mein ,
Jitni hum chodh diya karte the Paimaane mein…

st: Na tere aane ki aas hai,
s:
Na tere aane ki aas hai,
na tujhe pane ki pyaas hai.
phir bhi is “shareef” ka dil,
tere bina udaas hai.

st: Ek pal mein jo aakar gujar jaaye yeh hawa ka woh jhoka hai ..aur kuch nahi
s:
Ek pal mein jo aakar gujar jaaye yeh hawa ka woh jhoka hai ..aur kuch nahi
Pyar kahti hai duniya jise,ek rangeen dhokha hai .. aur kuch nahi

st: E Khuda Aaj Ye Faisla Karde,
s:
E Khuda Aaj Ye Faisla Karde,
Use Mera ya Mujhe Uska Karde.
Bahut Dukh Sahe He Maine,
Koi Khusi Ab Toh Muqadar Karde.

Bahot Muskil Lagta Hai Usse Duur Rehna,
Judai Ke Safar Ko Kum Karde.
Jitna Duur Chale Gaye Woh Mujhse,
Use Utna Kareeb Karde.

Nahi Likha Agar Nasib Me Uska Naam,
To Khatam Kar Ye Zindagi aur Mujhe FANAA Karde.

Dur Humse Jaa Paoge Kaise,
Humko Bhool Paoge Kaise.
Hum Who Khushbu Jo Saanson Mein Utar Jaye,
Khud Apni Saanson Ko Rok Paoge Kaise..

st: Dil ke chhalon ko koi shayari kahe, to dard nahi hota
s:
Dil ke chhalon ko koi shayari kahe, to dard nahi hota
Takleef to tab hoti hai, Jab log wah-wah karte hain

st: hehar ki is daud me daud ke karna kya hai?
s:
hehar ki is daud me daud ke karna kya hai?
Jab yehi jeena hai dosto to phir marna kya hai?

Paheli barish me train late hone ki fikr hai
Bhul gaye bhigte hue tahelna kya hai?

Serials ke kirdaaro ka saara haal hai malum hai
par maa ka haal puchhne ki fursat kahan hai?

Ab ret pe nage pao tahelte kyu nahi?
108 hai channel phir dil bahelte kyu nahi?

Internet ki duniya ke to touch me hai,
lekin pados me kon raheta hai jaante tak nahi.

Mobile, Landline sab ki bharmaar hai,
Lekin jigri dost tak pahuche aise taar kaha hai?

Kab dubte hue suraj ko dekha tha yaad hai?
Kab jaana tha shaam ka woh banana kya hai?

To Dosto Shehar ki es daud me daud ke karna kya hai
Jab yahi jeena hai to phir Marna kya hai?

st: Bas ab ek haan ke intezaar me raat yunhi guzar jaayegi,
s:
Bas ab ek haan ke intezaar me raat yunhi guzar jaayegi,
ab toh bas uljhan hai saath mere neend kahan aayegi,
Subah ki kiran na jaane konsa sandesh laayegi,
rimjhim is gungunayegi ya pyaas adhuri reh jaayegi…

st: Pyar ne ye kaisa tohfa de diya,
s:
Pyar ne ye kaisa tohfa de diya,
Mujhko gumo ne pathar bana diya.
Teri yaadon main hi kat gayi ye umar,
Kehta raha tujhe kab ka bhula diya…

st: Aap hamein bhool jayo humein koi gam nahin
s:
Aap hamein bhool jayo humein koi gam nahin
Jis din humne aapko bhula diya
Samjh lijiye ga is duniya mein hum nahin

st: babuji ne kahaa gaon chhod do,
s:
babuji ne kahaa gaon chhod do,
sabne kahaa paro ko chhod do,
paro ne kahaa sharaab chhod do,
aaj tumne kah dia, haweli chhod do,
ek din aayega jab wo kahenge, duniya hi chhod do

st: Apne hisse ki zindagi to hum jee chuke chunni babu,
s:
Apne hisse ki zindagi to hum jee chuke chunni babu,
Ab to bas dhadkanon ka lihaj karte hain,
Magar kya karen duniya walon ka,
Jo aakhari saans par bhi aitaraz karte hain.

st: आतिशे-बर्क़-ओ-सहाब पैदा कर
s:
आतिशे-बर्क़-ओ-सहाब पैदा कर
अजल भी कांप उठे, वो शबाब पैदा कर
तू इंकिलाब की आमद का इंतज़ार ना कर
जो हो सके, तो अभी इंकिलाब पैदा कर

st: Har yaar wafadar nahi hota,
s:
Har yaar wafadar nahi hota,
har patthar chamakdar nahi hota,
na jaane ban me kitne phool khile hain,
har phool khushbudaar nahin hota..

st: Deewane hain aapke iss baat se inkaar nahin
s:
Deewane hain aapke iss baat se inkaar nahin
Kaise kahen ke hume aapse pyaar nahin
Kuch to kasoor hai aapki adaayon mein
Akele hum hi gunehgaar nahi

st: Wo aag hi kya jo lag ke bade nahin
s:
Wo aag hi kya jo lag ke bade nahin
Wo nasha hi kya jo sir pe chade nahi
Nahin banta tab tak koi sacha aashiq
Jab tak ishq mein usko do chaar pade nahin

st: Na jjagte hue khaab dekha karte hain
s:
Na jjagte hue khaab dekha karte hain
Na chaaho usse jise paa na sako
Pyaar kahan kisi ka poora hota hai
Pyar ka pehla akshar adhoora hota hai
Nahin banta tab tak koi sacha aashiq
Jab tak ishq mein usko do chaar pade nahin

st: Apne hisse ki zindagi to hum jee chuke chunni babu,
s:
Apne hisse ki zindagi to hum jee chuke chunni babu,
Ab to bas dhadkanon ka lihaj karte hain,
Magar kya karen duniya walon ka,
Jo aakhari saans par bhi aitaraz karte hain.

st: Khuda Ne Jabb tujhe Banaya Hoga
s:
Khuda Ne Jabb tujhe Banaya Hoga
Ik Saroor Uske Dil Mein Ayea Hoga
Socha Hoga Keya Doonga Tohfe Mein Tujhe
Tabb Jaake Usne Mujhe Banaya Hoga…!!!

st: Na jjagte hue khaab dekha karte hain
s:
Na jjagte hue khaab dekha karte hain
Na chaaho usse jise paa na sako
Pyaar kahan kisi ka poora hota hai
Pyar ka pehla akshar adhoora hota hai

st: Pighle neelam sa behta ye sama,
s:
Pighle neelam sa behta ye sama,
neeli neeli si khamoshiyan,
na kahin hai zameen na kahin aasmaan,
sarsaraati hui tehniyaan pattiyaan,
keh raheen hai bas ek tum ho yahan,
bas main hoon,
meri saansein hain aur meri dhadkanein,
aisi gehraiyaan, aisi tanhaiyaan,
aur main… sirf main.
Apne hone par mujhko yakeen aa gaya.

st: Ik baat honton tak hai jo aayi nahin
s:
Ik baat honton tak hai jo aayi nahin
Bas ankhon say hai jhaankti
Tumse kabhi, mujhse kabhi
Kuch lafz hain woh maangti
Jinko pehanke honton tak aa jaaye woh
Aawaaz ki baahon mein baahein daalke ithlaye woh
Lekin jo yeh ik baat hai
Ahsas hi ahsas hai

st: Jab jab dard ka baadal chaya
s:
Jab jab dard ka baadal chaya
Jab ghum ka saya lehraya
Jab aansoo palkon tak aya
Jab yeh tanha dil ghabraya

Humne dil ko yeh samjhaya
Dil aakhir tu kyun rota hai
Duniya mein yunhi hota hai

Yeh jo gehre sannate hain
Waqt ne sabko hi baante hain
Thoda ghum hai sabka qissa
Thodi dhoop hai sabka hissa
Aankh teri bekaar hi nam hai
Har pal ek naya mausam hai
Kyun tu aise pal khota hai
Dil aakhir tu kyun rota hai

st: Dilon me tum apni betabiyan leke chal rahe ho,to zinda ho tum
s:
Dilon me tum apni betabiyan leke chal rahe ho,to zinda ho tum
Nazar me khwaabon ki bijliyan leke chal rahe ho,to zinda ho tum
Hwa ke jhokon ke jaise aazad rehno sekho
Tum ek dariya ke jaise lehron mein behna sekho
Hr ek lamhe se tum milo khole apni baahein
Hr ek pal ek naya sama dekhe nigahein
Jo apni ankhon mein hairanian leke chal rahe ho,to zinda ho tum
Dilon me tum apni betabiyan leke chal rahe ho,to zinda ho tum!
